full_threads.body:
This is great thank you so much

We are in the process of doing an internal audit for our website as we have received an RTO update regarding Website compliance

Once we have completed the internal audit, I would like to arrange to meet with you to discuss the required changes.

Is there a particular time you are available in about 2 weeks time

Lana Wheeler
RTO Manager

T: 028378 7722
M: 0481 069 908
E: LWheeler@mets.edu.au
W: mets.edu.au

104 Vanessa St, Kingsgrove, NSW 2208

Hi Lana,

Sorry about that.

I’ve now ensured that the course titles match exactly with Training.gov, and I’ve also removed the black course code above the course title as requested.

You can view the updated page here:
https://mets.edu.au/courses/

Please feel free to let me know if you’d like any further adjustments or if there’s anything else I can assist with.

Hi Rica

Thank you for your amazing quick response. I have checked the website and unfortunately, the changes to the course code/ name have not been made.

We need to include the - in each title

BSB20120 - Certificate II in Workplace Skills

As mentioned it has to the exact as Training.Gov

Just an FYI, some pages have the code twice. Can the black course code be removed



Feel free to call or Teams me if you need any further information

Please let me know when this has been completed

Thank you again

Lana Wheeler
RTO Manager

T: 028378 7722
M: 0481 069 908
E: LWheeler@mets.edu.au
W: mets.edu.au

104 Vanessa St, Kingsgrove, NSW 2208

Hi Lana, 

Thanks for submitting your request. Confirming we have now made the updates and they are ready for you to review. 

Here is the link: 
https://mets.edu.au/courses/

Please let us know if you would like any further changes.

Good morning



Thank you all for fixing the HLTAID012 code straight away



Can the below course codes and names also be amended asap for all the qualifications below.

All course codes and names are missing the - in them and needs to be amended straight away. Again, the course code and name has to be exact same as TGA

This will need to be changed on the Courses page and on each course page (and anywhere else a course code and name is)



Please confirm once this is done



Childcare

CHC30121 - Certificate III in Early Childhood Education and Care

CHC50121 - Diploma of Early Childhood Education and Care

Leadership

BSB40520 - Certificate IV in Leadership and Management

Business

BSB20120 - Certificate II in Workplace Skills

BSB30120 - Certificate III in Business

Disability

CHC32015 - Certificate III in Community Services

CHC33021 - Certificate III in Individual Support

CHC43121 - Certificate IV in Disability Support

Retail

SIR20216 - Certificate II in Retail Services

SIR30216 - Certificate III in Retail

Hospitality

SIT20322 - Certificate II in Hospitality

Supply Chain Operations

TLI20421 - Certificate II in Supply Chain Operations

TLI30321 - Certificate III in Supply Chain Operations

Short Courses

HLTAID009 - Provide cardiopulmonary resuscitation

HLTAID011 - Provide First Aid

HLTAID012 - Provide First Aid in an education and care setting

Child Protection Course

CHCPRT025 - Identify and report children and young people at risk

full_threads.body:
Hi Team

Can you please make this urgent fix below?

Much appreciated.

Ingrid


Ingrid Powell
Digital Marketing Manager
Scope (Aust) Ltd
1300 472 673

scopeaust.org.au | 1300 472 673


Working Days: Monday Tuesday Thursday Friday

From: Lana Wheeler <LWheeler@mets.edu.au>
Sent: Thursday, 3 October 2024 4:53 PM
To: Ingrid Powell <IPowell@scopeaust.org.au>; Reece Byron <rbyron@scopeaust.org.au>
Cc: Monique George <mstornelli@mets.edu.au>; Nichollette East <NEast@mets.edu.au>
Subject: URGENT change to HLTAID012 needed


Hi Ingrid and Reece

Looking at the website, we need to urgently change the HLTAID012 course name as it is incorrect. It currently is HLTAID012 Provide an Emergency First Aid Response in an Education and Care Setting

However, it needs to be HLTAID012 - Provide First Aid in an education and care setting

All of our course codes have to be the exact same as TGA (Training.Gov) is https://training.gov.au/


We are doing a complete website audit and would like to go over what we need to have changed for compliance purposes with you and the developers
Lana Wheeler
 RTO Manager

T: 028378 7722
M: 0481 069 908
E: LWheeler@mets.edu.au
 W: mets.edu.au

104 Vanessa St, Kingsgrove, NSW 2208
